channel.title: Loading Bar - Galkon 317 Client - I want to make the height smaller!
channel.description:
[img]http://image-host.com/images/8vjn77xhzr3nspth3bg.png[/img]
I want the change the height, to make it look skinnier. Something looking like this;
[img]http://image-host.com/images/7arabl9i5qosph1zrmk9.png[/img]
Thanks, DynastyRSPS

item.title: Loading Bar - Galkon 317 Client - I want to make the height smaller!
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

I don’t know EXACTLY what changes it but I know it is in “void method13(int i, byte byte0, String s)” in non-refactored or also known as “void drawLoadingText(int i, String s)” in refactored clients. If you’re really having a lot of trouble finding it still then I can have a further look.

Read full topic
item.source: Loading Bar - Galkon 317 Client - I want to make the height smaller!
